name: OpenAIPRReviewer
description: This task uses Open AI to review PullRequests
author: John McDonnell

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key of Open AI or Azure OpenAI.

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Open AI model
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Open AI model to use. not used if you use Azure Open AI. if no model is selected, the GPT 3.5 Turbo model is used.

inputs.name: aoi_endpoint
inputs.label: Azure Open AI API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Open AI API Endpoint, leave empty to use default endpoint. (optional)

inputs.name: support_self_signed_certificate
inputs.label: Support self-signed certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to support self-signed certificate.
